languages.text: "Так точно. Зовуcь теперь преподобный Зирмен. Раньше был в подчинении у Главного кормчего. Мастер Равор все говорил, как ему действует на нервы моя истовость в служении, но когда меня в исповедники назначили — ругался как в последний раз. Ценил, значит".

"That I am, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They call me Confessor Zirmen now. I used to be in the Master Helmsman's employ, and he kept saying how much my zeal was getting on his nerves. But he swore worse than usual when I was appointed confessor, so I guess he did appreciate me after all."
languages.original_text: "Так точно. Зовуcь теперь преподобный Зирмен. Раньше был в подчинении у Главного кормчего. Мастер Равор все говорил, как ему действует на нервы моя истовость в служении, но когда меня в исповедники назначили — ругался как в последний раз. Ценил, значит".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed I am. They call me Reverend Zirmen now. I used to be in the Master Helmsman's employ, and he kept saying how much my zeal was getting on his nerves. But he swore like a drunken sailor when I was appointed confessor, so I guess he did appreciate me after all."

"Indeed I am. They call me Reverend Zirmen now. I used to be in the Master Helmsman's employ, and he kept saying how much my zeal was getting on his nerves. But he swore like a drunken sailor when I was appointed confessor, so I guess he did appreciate me after all."

"Indeed I am. They call me Reverend Zirmen now. I used to be in the Master Helmsman's employ, and he kept saying how much my zeal was getting on his nerves. But he swore like a drunken sailor when I was appointed confessor, so I guess he did appreciate me after all."

"Indeed I am. They call me Reverend Zirmen now. I used to be in the Master Helmsman's employ, and he kept saying how much my zeal was getting on his nerves. But he swore like a drunken sailor when I was appointed confessor, so I guess he did appreciate me after all."

"That I am, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They call me Confessor Zirmen now. I used to be in the Master Helmsman's employ, and he kept saying how much my zeal was getting on his nerves. But he swore worse than usual when I was appointed confessor, so I guess he did appreciate me after all."

"That I am, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They call me Confessor Zirmen now. I used to be in the Master Helmsman's employ, and he kept saying how much my zeal was getting on his nerves. But he swore worse than usual when I was appointed confessor, so I guess he did appreciate me after all."

languages.text: "Der bin ich, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich werde jetzt Konfessor Zirmen genannt. Ich habe für den Hauptsteuermann gearbeitet, und er hat immer gesagt, wie sehr mein Eifer ihm auf die Nerven geht. Aber er hat noch schlimmer geflucht als sonst, als ich zum Konfessor ernannt wurde, also hatte er wohl doch etwas für mich übrig."
languages.original_text: "That I am, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They call me Confessor Zirmen now. I used to be in the Master Helmsman's employ, and he kept saying how much my zeal was getting on his nerves. But he swore worse than usual when I was appointed confessor, so I guess he did appreciate me after all."

traits.locale_text: "Der bin ich, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich werde jetzt Reverend Zirmen genannt. Ich habe für den Hauptsteuermann gearbeitet, und er hat immer gesagt, wie sehr mein Eifer ihm auf die Nerven geht. Aber er hat noch schlimmer geflucht als sonst, als ich zum Konfessor ernannt wurde, also hatte er wohl doch etwas für mich übrig."

languages.text: «Así es, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Ahora me llaman confesor Zirmen. Antes estaba al servicio del maestro timonel, y siempre decía que mi fervor religioso le ponía de los nervios. Pero soltó más palabrotas de lo habitual cuando fui nombrado confesor, por lo que imagino que algo debía de apreciarme».
languages.original_text: "That I am, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They call me Confessor Zirmen now. I used to be in the Master Helmsman's employ, and he kept saying how much my zeal was getting on his nerves. But he swore worse than usual when I was appointed confessor, so I guess he did appreciate me after all."

traits.locale_text: «Así es, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Ahora me llaman reverendo Zirmen. Antes estaba al servicio del maestro timonel, y siempre decía que mi fervor religioso le ponía de los nervios. Pero soltó más palabrotas de lo habitual cuando fui nombrado confesor, por lo que imagino que algo debía de apreciarme».

languages.text: 「それは私のことです、陛下。今は聴罪師ジルメンと呼ばれています。以前はマスター・ヘルムスマンに雇われていて、私の熱心さにはイラつかせられると何度も言われました。ですが私が聴罪師に任命されたとき、あの人はいつもより口が悪かったので、結局は私のことを評価してくれていたのだと思います」
languages.original_text: "That I am, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They call me Confessor Zirmen now. I used to be in the Master Helmsman's employ, and he kept saying how much my zeal was getting on his nerves. But he swore worse than usual when I was appointed confessor, so I guess he did appreciate me after all."

traits.locale_text: 「それは私のことです、陛下。今はジルメン司祭と呼ばれています。以前はマスター・ヘルムスマンに雇われていて、私の熱心さにはイラつかせられると何度も言われました。ですが私が聴罪師に任命されたとき、あの人はいつもより口が悪かったので、結局は私のことを評価してくれていたのだと思います」

languages.text: “正是我，大人，大家如今称我为告解神父齐曼。我以前是舵手长的手下，他一直说我实在是太热情了，把他搅得心烦意乱。不过，当我被任命为告解神父之后，他骂得更狠了。所以我猜，他应该还是挺欣赏我的。”
languages.original_text: "That I am, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They call me Confessor Zirmen now. I used to be in the Master Helmsman's employ, and he kept saying how much my zeal was getting on his nerves. But he swore worse than usual when I was appointed confessor, so I guess he did appreciate me after all."

traits.locale_text: “正是我，大人，大家如今称我为齐曼牧师。我以前是舵手长的手下，他一直说我实在是太热情了，把他搅得心烦意乱。不过，当我被任命为告解神父之后，他骂得更狠了。所以我猜，他应该还是挺欣赏我的。”

languages.text: « Tout à fait, Votre Seigneurie. Désormais, on m'appelle Confesseur Zirmen. Avant cela, je travaillais pour le maître timonier, et il n'arrêtait pas de me reprocher ma trop grande piété, mais il a été encore plus contrarié par ma nomination au poste de confesseur... Comme quoi, il faut croire que je ne l'agaçais pas tant que ça. »
languages.original_text: "That I am, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They call me Confessor Zirmen now. I used to be in the Master Helmsman's employ, and he kept saying how much my zeal was getting on his nerves. But he swore worse than usual when I was appointed confessor, so I guess he did appreciate me after all."

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait, Votre Seigneurie. Désormais, on m'appelle révérend Zirmen. Avant cela, je travaillais pour le maître timonier, et il n'arrêtait pas de me reprocher ma trop grande piété, mais il a été encore plus contrarié par ma nomination au poste de confesseur... Comme quoi, il faut croire que je ne l'agaçais pas tant que ça. »

languages.text: "Öyleyim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bana artık Günah Çıkarıcı Zirmen deniyor. Eskiden Başserdümen'in hizmetindeydim ve şevkimin ne kadar sinirine dokunduğundan bahsedip dururdu. Ama günah çıkarıcı olarak atandığımda daha bile ağır küfretti, yani demek ki değerimi biliyormuş nihayetinde."
languages.original_text: "That I am, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They call me Confessor Zirmen now. I used to be in the Master Helmsman's employ, and he kept saying how much my zeal was getting on his nerves. But he swore worse than usual when I was appointed confessor, so I guess he did appreciate me after all."
